Public Member Functions

 ref_counter (T initValue=0)
 Construct reference counter with specified value initValue.
T getCounter () const
 Get current value of reference counter. The value is loaded with membar_relaxed constraint.
template<typename ORDER >

 Get current value of reference counter. ORDER is memory order constraint for loading.

 Current value of reference counter. The value is loaded with membar_relaxed constraint.
void inc ()
 Atomic increment.
bool dec ()
 Atomic decrement. Return true if reference counter is 0.

Private Attributes

atomic< T > m_nRefCount

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cds::ref_counter< T >

Simple reference counter.

Thread-safe reference counter build on atomic primitives. T is one of atomic types
